text: irisu ya bemehayimochu wisit’i anik’ets’ochuni (k’uri’anini) be’inerisu layi yemiyanebilachewi፣ (kemagarati) yemiyat’erachewimi፣ mets’ihafinina t’ibebini yemiyasitemirachewimi yehoneni melikitenya (muhamedini) ke’inerisuwi wisit’i yelake newi፡፡ inerisumi ke’irisu befiti begilits’i sihiteti wisit’i neberu፡፡
